meta.title: For Cleaning Companies | HelpMeClean.ro
meta.description: Partner with HelpMeClean: get new clients online, manage bookings digitally and grow your cleaning business in Romania.

hero.title: Grow your business with HelpMeClean
hero.subtitle: We bring new clients directly to your door. No hidden fees, no hassle — just verified orders and guaranteed payments.

benefits.title: Why choose HelpMeClean?
benefits.subtitle: The platform built specifically for cleaning companies in Romania.
benefits.b1Desc: We reach thousands of households in Bucharest and major cities. You focus on cleaning, we handle marketing.
benefits.b2Desc: Payments are processed online and guaranteed. No chasing payments — collect directly into your account.
benefits.b3Desc: Dedicated dashboard to manage orders, team and schedule. Everything in one place.
benefits.b4Desc: Partner companies report an average 40% increase in orders within their first 3 months.

howToJoin.title: How to become a partner?
howToJoin.subtitle: The process takes less than 10 minutes.
howToJoin.s1Desc: Fill in the form with your company details: tax ID, contact person, service area.
howToJoin.s2Desc: Our team verifies your company documents (registration certificate, civil insurance) within 48 hours.
howToJoin.s3Desc: Your account is activated and you start receiving bookings from HelpMeClean directly on your phone.

requirements.title: Partner requirements
requirements.r1Desc: Legally registered company in Romania with an active unique tax identification number.
requirements.r2Desc: Civil liability insurance for cleaning activities, covering potential damages.
requirements.r3Desc: Registration certificate from the Trade Register and articles of incorporation.

cta.title: Ready to grow?
cta.subtitle: Join the first partner companies and get priority access to orders in the HelpMeClean platform.
